meta.title: About Modulary
meta.description: Stop juggling 10 tools. Build your branded app where courses, clients, and content live in one place.

hero.label: Why Modulary
hero.description: You're a coach, trainer, therapist or creator. You're great at transforming lives—but you're drowning in tools. Zoom for calls. Notion for content. Stripe for payments. Calendly for bookings. Teachable for courses. Sound familiar?

problem.title: The Problem We Solve
problem.description: Every day, thousands of professionals waste hours switching between apps, paying for 5+ subscriptions, and losing clients in the chaos. Your knowledge deserves better than scattered spreadsheets and disconnected tools.

mission.title: One Platform
mission.description: Everything your business needs—courses, scheduling, payments, client portal, content library—unified in a single branded app that's truly yours.

vision.title: Zero Code
vision.description: No developers needed. No technical skills required. If you can use Instagram, you can build your app with Modulary. Launch in minutes, not months.

values.title: Your Brand
values.description: Your logo. Your colors. Your domain. Your clients see YOUR app, not another generic platform. Build trust and professionalism that sets you apart.

team.label: Who We Are
team.title: Built by Coaches, for Coaches
team.description: We've been in your shoes—juggling tools, losing clients in email threads, paying for software we barely used. We built Modulary because we needed it ourselves.

cta.title: Ready to Unify Everything?
cta.description: Stop paying for 5 tools that don't talk to each other. Build your app in 10 minutes.
